verses.text: A Psalm of David \add on the occasion\add* of the solemn assembly of the Tabernacle. Bring to the Lord, ye sons of God, Bring to the Lord young rams; Bring to the Lord glory and honor.
Bring to the Lord glory, \add due\add* to his name; Worship the Lord in his holy court.
The voice of the Lord is upon the waters: The God of glory has thundered: The Lord is upon many waters.
The voice of the Lord is mighty; The voice of the Lord is full of majesty.
\add There is\add* the voice of the Lord who breaks the cedars; The Lord will break the cedars of Lebanon.
And he will beat them small, \add even\add* Lebanon itself, like a calf; And the beloved one is as a young unicorn.
\add There is\add* a voice of the Lord who divides a flame of fire.
A voice of the Lord who shakes the wilderness; The Lord will shake the wilderness of Kadesh.
The voice of the Lord strengthens the hinds, And will uncover the thickets: And in his temple everyone speaks \add of his\add* glory.
The Lord will dwell on the waterflood: And the Lord will sit a king forever.
The Lord will give strength to his people; The Lord will bless his people with peace.
